title: Decimal to DWORD Conversion Function
description: This function converts a decimal string representation into a DWORD (Double Word) numeric format. The function reads each character of the input string, validates if it represents a decimal digit, and accumulates its value to produce the final DWORD result.
name: DEC_TO_DWORD

input.name: DEC
input.description: A string of up to 20 characters representing a decimal number.

return_value.description: The resulting DWORD value obtained from the decimal string conversion.
